thread.title: Tony Blair sparks fury over plans to urge Remoaners to ‘rise up and fight Brexit at any cost’ and persuade Leave voters to change their mind
thread.title_full: Tony Blair sparks fury over plans to urge Remoaners to ‘rise up and fight Brexit at any cost’ and persuade Leave voters to change their mind

author: Alain Tolhurst
title: Tony Blair sparks fury over plans to urge Remoaners to ‘rise up and fight Brexit at any cost’ and persuade Leave voters to change their mind
text:
Opinion 'OUT OF TOUCH AND ELITIST' Tony Blair sparks fury over plans to urge Remoaners to ‘rise up and fight Brexit at any cost’ and persuade Leave voters to change their mind 
Ex-PM will use big speech to slam Theresa May for putting the British economy at risk through a so-called 'hard Brexit' By ALAIN TOLHURST
